# delegate

**Instance Property**

The app delegate object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any NSApplicationDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The app object and app delegate work in tandem to manage the app’s overall behavior. Typically, the delegate is configured automatically by the Xcode project templates.

## Managing the app’s behavior

- **NSApplicationDelegate**: A set of methods that manage your app’s life cycle and its interaction with common system services.
